Question: Disabled?
Constraint/Rule: if (UniversalAccess2*.DecreaseTextSize) {Disabled = true;}if (Windows*.LowerWindowBelowOtherWindows) {Disabled = true;}if (Typing2*.ComposeKey) {Disabled = true;}if (Navigation) {Disabled = true;}if (UniversalAccess2*.TurnOnScreenKeyboardOnOrOff) {Disabled = true;}if (Windows*.ToggleFullscreenMode) {Disabled = true;}if (Typing2*.AlternativeCharactersKey) {Disabled = true;}if (Windows*.RaiseWindowAboveOtherWindows) {Disabled = true;}if (UniversalAccess2*.IncreaseTextSize) {Disabled = true;}if (UniversalAccess2*.HighContrastOnOrOff) {Disabled = true;}

Question: Long?
Constraint/Rule: if (Delay1*.Long5) {Long = true;}if (AcceptanceDelay3.Long2) {Long = true;}if (Delay2.Long1) {Long = true;}if (AcceptanceDelay2*.Long4) {Long = true;}if (AcceptanceDelay1.Long3) {Long = true;}

Question: Navigation?
Constraint/Rule: if (!(((((((((Windows*.LowerWindowBelowOtherWindows || Windows*.RaiseWindowAboveOtherWindows) || Windows*.ToggleFullscreenMode) || UniversalAccess2*.HighContrastOnOrOff) || UniversalAccess2*.DecreaseTextSize) || UniversalAccess2*.IncreaseTextSize) || UniversalAccess2*.TurnOnScreenKeyboardOnOrOff) || Typing2*.AlternativeCharactersKey) || Typing2*.ComposeKey) || !Disabled)) {Navigation = true;}

Question: Short?
